data.title: Award Winning Luxury Couples Retreat
data.meta_description: The Buckland Luxury Spa Retreat for Couples in the High Country. Ideal getaway for engagements, anniversaries and honeymoons.
data.text:
The Buckland Studios

A world unto itself

Stay - Indulge - Reconnect

With breathtaking views of Mt Buffalo’s striking treetops and granite tors, The Buckland Studios are a little piece of paradise. Set among rolling hills and beautiful bushland, you’ll find our couples only, bed and breakfast retreat.

We’re conveniently located just 12 kms from the charming Bright township, in the heart of the picturesque Buckland Valley.

Relax and indulge in the privacy of your very own luxe studio, complete with everything you need for a heavenly getaway.

Make memories to last a lifetime

At The Buckland Studios, we pride ourselves on considering every detail, to make your stay a memorable respite from the everyday.

Whether you’re celebrating your honeymoon, babymoon or anniversary, or planning a romantic getaway to relax and reconnect, the private studios are tastefully appointed with everything you need to leave feeling refreshed, rejuvenated and pampered.

Each studio is self-contained with kitchen space, BBQ access, a generous welcome hamper and luxe furnishings. Self check-in, check-out and concierge services are available for your convenience.

Are you celebrating a special occasion?

If you’re celebrating a significant event in your life, such as your honeymoon, please let us know in your booking details. We’d love to add a few special touches to your room.

Kind words from our guests

“Our stay at The Buckland was amazing and memorable. From the super comfortable bed, sparkling clean studio, scenic morning mountain views and delicious breakfast package, we can’t help but keep coming back again and again! Thank you David and Melany for your hospitality and service. The Buckland is truly a magical place!”

— Bess and Rocky

We acknowledge the Taungurung people, the Traditional Owners of this land. We pay our respects to their leaders and Elders past, present and emerging, for they hold forever the memories, traditions, culture and hopes of all Taungurung people.

The Buckland Studios are welcoming and inclusive of all couples.
